name: Bat Out of Hell
description:
Credits:

Dwaynedev - Programming, Music, supporting SFX, Game Design, 

Title and Win Screen art

MartFart -  SFX, Game Design

CitrusPulp - Art, Games Design, QA - Links: https://itch.io/profile/citruspulp

Game:

Your Playing a serious game of Baseball against Satan and his Demons.

Go for a Homerun!

Game controls:

Arrow Keys: movement

*hold left control to use the walking speed for careful movement

X key: Use spell Card

Z key: Switch Spell card slots

*PATCH NOTES* :

- Added Music for different parts of the game and boss Fight track for the end.

- Added Art for title and win screens

-Added walking ability

- If Player losses ball they will have speed greatly reduced
